name: Board Hoard Demo
description:
Gameplay Demo of Board Hoard.

We are two exhausted, but happy souls from the HKU working a cosplayer's skate game.

The main goal of the game is very simple : Collect all the skateboards and get your costumes! The game is planned to have a world map, multiple levels and different types of skateboards and costumes.

Our first demo features the jump and movement to show you guys.

We would love to hear thoughts and feedback on our first little demo level, this will help us to develop a way cooler game than it is already :)

Press Space to jump

ESC-key to quit.
